title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Extended deprecation dates for GHES versions 3.14-3.18 in `enterprise-dates.json` (e.g., 3.14 from 2025-08-27 to 2026-03-17).
Reactivated deprecation banner tests by removing `.skip` and deleted conditional hiding logic in `DeprecationBanner.tsx`.
Delayed GraphQL `SearchType.ISSUE_ADVANCED` removal from 2025-09-04 to 2025-11-04 across schema files.
summary:
- Extended deprecation dates for GHES versions 3.14-3.18 in `enterprise-dates.json` (e.g., 3.14 from 2025-08-27 to 2026-03-17).
- Reactivated deprecation banner tests by removing `.skip` and deleted conditional hiding logic in `DeprecationBanner.tsx`.
- Delayed GraphQL `SearchType.ISSUE_ADVANCED` removal from 2025-09-04 to 2025-11-04 across schema files.
generated_title: Update GHES deprecation dates and delay GraphQL ISSUE_ADVANCED removal
commits: **0df7c29**: Updating new end of support dates for GHES 3.14, 3.15, 3.16 and 3.17. (#57409) (by Pallavi)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Extended deprecation dates for GHES versions 3.14-3.18 in `enterprise-dates.json` (e.g., 3.14 from 2025-08-27 to 2026-03-17).
- Reactivated deprecation banner tests by removing `.skip` and deleted conditional hiding logic in `DeprecationBanner.tsx`.
- Delayed GraphQL `SearchType.ISSUE_ADVANCED` removal from 2025-09-04 to 2025-11-04 across schema files.

### Title
Update GHES deprecation dates and delay GraphQL ISSUE_ADVANCED removal
